glosses: to serve worship, regard sth. as divine

examples.translation: Arabs used to worship idols before Islam came out.

examples.text: O kadar güzel, o kadar ikonik ki... Tapıyorum bu kadına.
examples.translation: How beatiful, how iconic she is... I admire this woman.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish طاپمق (tapmak, “to find, meet; to bow down, worship”), from Proto-Turkic *tap- (“to serve, worship”). Compare Old Turkic [script needed] (tap-, “to serve, worship”).
